snippet: Less than two months after being forced out of the Tour de France when he broke his leg in a crash, Contador won his third Vuelta a España.
abstract: Alberto Contador of Spain wins his third Vuelta a Espana bicycle race; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: Less than two months after being forced out of the Tour de France when he broke his leg in a crash, Contador won his third Vuelta a España.

headline.main: Alberto Contador Captures His Third Vuelta a España
headline.print_headline: Contador Captures His Third Vuelta a España
